Detailed Description

Definitions for SPU event handling operations.

Function Documentation

static void ctk_event_ack ( unsigned int  event  )  [inline, static]

Acks an SPU event and resets it. [Non-Blocking]

Note:
Events that have been reported (i.e., enabled and not masked) continue to be reported until acknowleged (unless cleared by the privileged software). from CBE Architecture's guide: "Software should acknowledge all events to be processed before processing the vents."

static int ctk_event_check_enabled (  )  [inline, static]

Checks the current SPU machine status and returns 1 if interrupts are enabled.

Returns:
1 if interrupts (events) are enabled, 0 otherwise.

static int ctk_event_count (  )  [inline, static]

Gets the count of unhandled SPU events (MAX = 1).

Returns:
1 if there's an event, 0 otherwise.

static unsigned int ctk_event_disable (  )  [inline, static]

Disables interrupts and returns the old interrupts status.

Returns:
the old interrupt status

static void ctk_event_enable (  )  [inline, static]

Enables interrupts.

static unsigned int ctk_event_get_mask (  )  [inline, static]

Reads the current interrupt (event) mask.

Returns:
the event mask

static int ctk_event_read (  )  [inline, static]

Reads the SPU event status. [Blocking] SPU stalls if there's no pending event.

static unsigned int ctk_event_set_mask ( unsigned int  new_mask  )  [inline, static]

Sets the interrupt (event) mask to the new value and returns its previous value.

Parameters:
[in] new - the new event mask to be set
Returns:
the old event mask
